title: Game CRASHED MID GAME then FIREWALL MESSAGE WHEN TRYING TO RECONNECT
body: playing 10 mins or so into the game, it crashed and when trying to reconect the firewall message shows

replies.body:
I have no idea what causes it, but I do know how to fix it. Close the client (the window you are playing League in) and when it tells you to reconnect, close that window too. Now, open League back up, sign back in, and reconnect. You should be able to sign back in without receiving a LeaverBuster warning.

If it does't work the first time, close it again and sign back in. If it doesn't work AGAIN, reset your computer.

yeah it happens to me occasionally this is the easiest  and probs quickest way to deal with it but also as an extra tip make sure  u dont alt tab during loading screen until the background and player things have appeared if its a black screen with the loading thing wait otherwise  it wont load if u alt  tab too early
I don't know about this. I have alt+tab out many times before, but then again I use borderless instead of fullscreen.
It's your internet, had that problem before.
